    • Method Detail

      • getJDBCP

        public static JDBConnectionProduct getJDBCP()

      • getAllProducts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getAllProducts(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method is used when a seller wants to see its products list. It gets all the products from the seller into the database (thanks to its nickname). The nickname argument specifies the user and must be a String.

        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user),
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Products
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getProduct

        public Product getProduct(java.lang.String nickname,
                          java.lang.String pdtName)
                   throws ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException
        This method is used when a seller wants to get a product of its products list. It gets the product wanted by the seller from the database (thanks to the seller's nickname and the product's name). The nickname/product name argument specifies the user/product and must be a String.

        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user), product name (a String giving the name of the product)
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Products
        Throws:
        ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createProduct

        public void createProduct(java.lang.String nickname,
                          java.lang.String pdt_name,
                          java.lang.Integer pdt_quantity,
                          java.lang.Integer pdt_price,
                          java.lang.String pdt_briefDesc,
                          java.lang.String pdt_longDesc)
        This method is used when a seller wants to create a product and add it to its products list. It creates the seller product into the database (thanks to the seller's nickname and the product's name). The nickname/product name argument specifies the user/product and must be a String.

        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the seller), product name (a String giving the name of the product), product quantity (an Integer giving the product quantity in stocks), product price (an Integer giving the product price), product brief description (a String giving the brief description of the product), product long description (a String giving the long description of the product),
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteProduct

        public void deleteProduct(java.lang.String pdt_name,
                          java.lang.String nickname)
        This method is used when a seller wants to delete a product from its products list. It deletes the seller product from the database (thanks to the seller's nickname and the product's name). The nickname/product name argument specifies the user/product and must be a String.

        Parameters:
        product - name (a String giving the name of the product), nickname (a String giving the nickname of the seller),
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
